title: Almay Smart Shade Blush, Pink 010, 0.5-Ounce Tubes (Pack of 2)
description: Transforms into your ideal blush shade! Takes the guesswork out of finding the right blush shade. Breakthrough shade-sensing technology transforms into the perfect shade for your skintone. Provides easy, buildable coverage. Infused with nourishing antioxidants such as grape seed, ginseng, and ginkgo biloba. Hypoallergenic. Won't clog pores. Made in U.S.A. with U.S. and non-U.S. components.
